note.p: Career: Bank clerk, Wakefield (1843-1846); worked in London branch of the Agra Bank (1846); Manager, Banking house of Glyn, Mills and Co (1862-1881); Secretary, Globe Insurance Company; expert on statistics and banking; Fellow of the Institute of Actuaries
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; Institute of Actuaries
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1882-1883 vol 34 pp xvii-xix signed by W A G
